meanings.sent1: The small dog was jumpier than the big dog.
meanings.sent2: She felt jumpier than usual after watching a scary movie.
meanings.sent3: The jumpier cat jumped at the sound of a falling leaf.
meanings.sent4: His heart raced, making him even jumpier than a rabbit in a field.
meanings.sent5: The dark alley made her feel even jumpier than a squirrel in a thunderstorm.

meanings.definition: More nervous or easily startled than something else
meanings.sent1: The kitten was jumpier than the puppy during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: He became jumpier as the deadline for the project approached.
meanings.sent3: The jumpier squirrel ran away from a harmless butterfly.
meanings.sent4: Her nerves were jumpier than a tightrope walker without a safety net.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house made him feel even jumpier than a mouse in a room full of cats.
